name: PRnine
overview:
PRnine provides online press release distribution and writing services.

The company offers search engine optimization features to build awareness, image and web traffic for its clients.

These features include placement of press releases distributed by PRnine on the company websiteâ€™s front page, integration of client-selected graphics into the press release, active backlinks, keyword selection, a wide search engine friendly distribution network, and permanent archiving in an SEO friendly format on PRnineâ€™s website.

PRnine also offers customized press release writing services for clients whose needs go beyond standard distribution.
